#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define lp(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define ll long long int
int main(){
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
    int n,i;
    cin>>n;
    ll arr[n],arr2[n];
    lp(i,0,n){
      cin>>arr[i];
    }
    if(n==0){
        cout<<"0\n";
        continue;
    }

    arr2[0]=arr[0];
    arr2[1]=max(arr[0],arr[1]);
    lp(i,2,n){
      arr2[i]=max(arr[i]+arr2[i-2],arr2[i-1]);
    }
    cout<<arr2[n-1]<<"\n";
  }
  return 0;
}
